description:
KaOS Linux 2025.03 independent distribution is now available for download with the KDE Plasma 6.3 desktop environment and Linux kernel 6.12 LTS. Here’s what’s new!

The post KaOS 2025.03 Linux Distro Released with KDE Plasma 6.3 and Linux Kernel 6.13 appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: KaOS 2025.03 Linux Distro Released with KDE Plasma 6.3 and Linux Kernel 6.13
